title: Constructivist-Based Distance Education Instructional Design Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in online education platforms and foundational concepts of instructional design
context.additional_context: Mobile-friendly program designed for corporate managers/leaders to rapidly acquire remote education design capabilities in response to the rapidly changing educational landscape post-COVID-19

learning_goals: Learners will be able to explain the online lecture design process based on constructivist approaches in three or more stages.
Learners will be able to establish action plans linking learning objectives to assessment tools by applying Backwards Design principles.
Learners will self-assess their competency in using LMS tools and complete projects applying two or more tools to real-world work scenarios.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
